languages.text: "Я буду безмерно благодарен, если вы также напомните ему больше не разбрасывать по кораблю свои ценные вещи, Лорд-капитан".
"I would be immensely grateful if you would also remind him to stop scattering his valuables around the ship, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Я буду безмерно благодарен, если вы также напомните ему больше не разбрасывать по кораблю свои ценные вещи, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "I would be immensely grateful if you would also remind him to stop scattering his valuables around the ship, Lord Captain."
"I would be immensely grateful if you would also remind him to stop scattering his valuables around the ship, Lord Captain."
"I would be immensely grateful if you would also remind him to stop scattering his valuables around the ship, Lord Captain."
"I would be immensely grateful if you would also remind him to stop scattering his valuables around the ship, Lord Captain."
"I would be immensely grateful if you would also remind him to stop scattering his valuables around the ship, Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Ich wäre Euch ausgesprochen dankbar, wenn Ihr ihn bei dieser Gelegenheit auch bitten könntet, seine Wertsachen nicht überall auf dem Schiff zu verteilen, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "I would be immensely grateful if you would also remind him to stop scattering his valuables around the ship, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wäre Euch ausgesprochen dankbar, wenn Ihr ihn bei dieser Gelegenheit auch bitten könntet, seine Wertsachen nicht überall auf dem Schiff zu verteilen, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Je vous serai extrêmement reconnaissant de lui demander également de ne pas laisser ses affaires traîner dans le vaisseau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "I would be immensely grateful if you would also remind him to stop scattering his valuables around the ship, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous serai extrêmement reconnaissant de lui demander également de ne pas laisser ses affaires traîner dans le vaisseau, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: 「ついでに、彼に貴重品を船内のあちこちにばらまくのをやめるよう注意していただければ、大変ありがたく存じます、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "I would be immensely grateful if you would also remind him to stop scattering his valuables around the ship, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「ついでに、彼に貴重品を船内のあちこちにばらまくのをやめるよう注意していただければ、大変ありがたく存じます、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, le agradecería que también le recuerde que deje de repartir sus objetos de valor por la nave».
languages.original_text: "I would be immensely grateful if you would also remind him to stop scattering his valuables around the ship, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, le agradecería que también le recuerde que deje de repartir sus objetos de valor por la nave».

languages.text: “如果您能再提醒他一句，让他别再把贵重物品遗落在船上，我将不胜感激，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "I would be immensely grateful if you would also remind him to stop scattering his valuables around the ship, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “如果您能再提醒他一句，让他别再把贵重物品遗落在船上，我将不胜感激，舰长大人。”

languages.text: "Kendisine kıymetli eşyalarını orada burada bırakmamasını da tembihlerseniz müteşekkir olurum Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "I would be immensely grateful if you would also remind him to stop scattering his valuables around the ship, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Kendisine kıymetli eşyalarını gemimde orada burada bırakmamasını da tembihlerseniz müteşekkir olurum Lord Kaptan."
